name: Play Craft GO
description:
Launch the game and create your first pickaxe, explore amazing places in search of valuable resources and diamonds, go down to the deepest mines and caves, climb to the tops of high mountains, look around giant canyons in a variety of biomes (summer, winter, desert and many others with a new system of generation of the game world), take a trip on your boat in search of new fairy-tale islands.
At your disposal are many beautiful interior items, create your own original home, decorate your home with various decorations and household appliances.
Completely free game for children and adults, suitable for boys and girls, explore the pixel 3D world, extract treasures and make new friends. A huge number of diverse characters are waiting for you and your adventures!
